bioconda.name: bioconductor-rcgh
bioconda.summary: Comprehensive Pipeline for Analyzing and Visualizing Array-Based CGH Data

biotools.summary: A comprehensive pipeline for analyzing and interactively visualizing genomic profiles generated through commercial or custom aCGH arrays. This package takes all the steps required for individual genomic profiles analysis, from reading files to profiles segmentation and gene annotations. It also provides several visualization functions which facilitate individual profiles interpretation.
